content.raw:
Sure, this sounds like a harmless but useful change. Thank you for the suggestion.

I'm on the fence on whether the new behavior should be to keep encoded strings or omit them altogether. But maybe it makes sense to go for the latter as this will more often be used when the encoded data are not needed at all, and the bytes will just eat memory and screen space.
